org.intermine.webservice.client.services

Class ListService.ListOperationInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.intermine.webservice.client.services.ListService.ListOperationInfo
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ListService.ListCreationInfo
    Enclosing class:
    ListService

    public class ListService.ListOperationInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstraction of the combination of options that can be specified to generate a new list in a list operation. This object has facilities for supplying the minimum amount of information, including automatically generating unused list names.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ListService.ListOperationInfo()
      Create a new options bundle with all values set to their defaults.
      ListService.ListOperationInfo(java.lang.String name)
      Create a new options bundle, with all elements set to their default apart from the name, which is given.
      ListService.ListOperationInfo(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description)
      Create a new options bundle, with all elements set to their default apart from the name and the description, which are given.
      ListService.ListOperationInfo(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, java.util.Collection<? extends java.lang.String> tags)
      Create a new options bundle, specifying all options.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Add a tag to the set of tags to apply.

      Add some tags to the set of tags to apply.
      java.lang.String getTagString()
      Get the tags joined in the manner required for the list service.
      protected java.lang.String getUnusedListName()
      Get a name for the list if none has been supplied.

      • ListService.ListOperationInfo

        public ListService.ListOperationInfo(java.lang.String name,
                             java.lang.String description)
        Create a new options bundle, with all elements set to their default apart from the name and the description, which are given.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the new list to create.
        description - A description to apply to the list.

                             java.util.Collection<? extends java.lang.String> tags)
        Create a new options bundle, specifying all options.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the new list to create.
        description - A description to apply to the list.
        tags - The tags to apply to the list.

    • Method Detail

      • addTag

        Add a tag to the set of tags to apply.

      • addTags

        Parameters:
        tags - The tags to apply.

      • getTagString

        public java.lang.String getTagString()
        Get the tags joined in the manner required for the list service.
        Returns:
        A string suitable for using as a value in a list service request.

      • getUnusedListName

        protected java.lang.String getUnusedListName()
        Get a name for the list if none has been supplied.
        Returns:
        A new default name, which does not clash with the name of any existing name the user has access to.
